en-US: Select an overlay file to use.
Refreshes the list of available overlay files from the 'Overlays' directory in the Cities: Skylines II user settings directory.
The size of the overlay image projection, in meters.  This can also be changed in-game using the minus and equals keys.
Resets the overlay size to the default playable map size (14,336m).
The transparency of the image; 0% is fully opaque and 100% is fully transparent (invisible).
